title: Party Hard 2
description:
Welcome back to the extended Party Hard universe Choose from hundreds of ways of dealing with noisy partygoers, incidentally destroy a drug syndicate, and save the Earth from an alien invasion. May the chickens be with you You just want to get some sleep But itâ€™s 3am, and once again your neighbors are having a loud party. You have to finally put an end to it by any means. AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAaAAAAA!!! Remastered
The craziest party stopping stealth-strategy game is back! Party Hard 2 stays true to its crazy party crashing roots while introducing tons of shiny features:
